exclusion: Open cover, click Z-Wave button 3 times rapidly.  LED indicator will start blinking.
inclusion: Open cover, click Z-Wave button 3 times rapidly.  LED indicator will start blinking.
label: ZSE44
usage: Reports temperature and humidity.  Has association groups for temperature and humidity.
wakeup: Open cover, click Z-Wave button rapidly 4 times.  The LED indication will flash twice.

parameters.label: Battery Reporting Threshold
parameters.description: Set the threshold for battery reporting
parameters.overview: Sets the percentage change to cause a battery report

parameters.label: Low Battery
parameters.description: When the sensor should report low battery
parameters.overview: Sets the low battery threshold by percentage

parameters.label: Temperature Reporting Threshold
parameters.description: Sensor will send a new temperature report if difference exceeds this threshold
parameters.overview: Sets change reporting threshold value for temperature in tenths of a degree

parameters.label: Humidity Reporting Threshold
parameters.description: Sensor will send a new humidity report if difference exceeds this threshold value

parameters.label: Temperature Alarm High
parameters.description: Set the temperature level for a heat alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 2.
parameters.overview: Set the temperature level for a high heat alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 2.

parameters.label: High Temperature Alarm Reporting
parameters.description: Decide if and how the sensor should report a heat alert.
parameters.overview: Values: 0 – no notifications sent to the hub or association groups; 1 – notification sent to the hub only; 2 – Basic Set On command sent to devices in Group 2 only; 3 – notification sent to the hub (lifeline) and Basic Set On to the devices associated in Group 2; 4 – Basic Set Off command sent to devices in Group 2 only; 5 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set Off to the devices associated in Group 2; 6 – Basic Set On and Off commands sent to devices in Group 2 only; 7 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set On and Off to the devices associated in Group 2 (default).

parameters.label: Temperature Alarm Low
parameters.description: Set the temperature level for a freeze / low temperature alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 3.
parameters.overview: Set the temperature level for a freeze / low temperature alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 3.

parameters.label: Low Temperature Alarm Reporting
parameters.description: Decide if and how the sensor should report a low temperature / freeze alert.
parameters.overview: Values: 0 – no notifications sent to the hub or association groups; 1 – notification sent to the hub only; 2 – Basic Set On command sent to devices in Group 3 only; 3 – notification sent to the hub (lifeline) and Basic Set On to the devices associated in Group 3; 4 – Basic Set Off command sent to devices in Group 3 only; 5 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set Off to the devices associated in Group 3; 6 – Basic Set On and Off commands sent to devices in Group 3 only; 7 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set On and Off to the devices associated in Group 3 (default).

parameters.label: Humidity Alerts High
parameters.description: Set the humidity level for a high humidity alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 4.

parameters.label: High Humidity Alarm Reporting
parameters.description: Decide if and how the sensor should report a high humidity alert.
parameters.overview: Values: 0 – no notifications sent to the hub or association groups; 1 – notification sent to the hub only; 2 – Basic Set On command sent to devices in Group 4 only; 3 – notification sent to the hub (lifeline) and Basic Set On to the devices associated in Group 4; 4 – Basic Set Off command sent to devices in Group 4 only; 5 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set Off to the devices associated in Group 4; 6 – Basic Set On and Off commands sent to devices in Group 4 only; 7 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set On and Off to the devices associated in Group 4 (default).

parameters.label: Humidity Alerts Low
parameters.description: Set the humidity level for a low humidity alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 5.

parameters.label: Low Humidity Alarm Reporting
parameters.description: Decide if and how the sensor should report a low humidity alert.
parameters.overview: Values: 0 – no notifications sent to the hub or association groups; 1 – notification sent to the hub only; 2 – Basic Set On command sent to devices in Group 5 only; 3 – notification sent to the hub (lifeline) and Basic Set On to the devices associated in Group 5; 4 – Basic Set Off command sent to devices in Group 5 only; 5 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set Off to the devices associated in Group 5; 6 – Basic Set On and Off commands sent to devices in Group 5 only; 7 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set On and Off to the devices associated in Group 5 (default).

parameters.label: Temperature Offset
parameters.overview:
0 = -10 degree offset

100 = 0 degree offset

200 = +10 degree offset

parameters.label: Temperature Reporting Interval
parameters.description: Sensor will report temperature at least as often as this value
parameters.overview:
Sets the time in minutes for the minimum temperature reporting interval

0 disables setting

parameters.label: Humidity Reporting Interval
parameters.description: Sensor will report humidity at least as often as this value
parameters.overview:
Sets the minimum time interval for humidity reports in minutes

0 disables this setting
